AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States/Mexican Border Patrol: conducted a roving stop of the large white Ford pickup truck and patrols a 140-mile area of the United States/Mexican border, involved in surveillance and pursuit of suspicious vehicles, conducted a stop, makes temporary investigative stops based on reasonable suspicion, had reason to believe that the large white Ford pickup truck had recently crossed the United States/Mexican border, has agents with experience detecting illegal activity in the United States/Mexican border area, drew inferences from historical facts and events leading up to a stop

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States: country with shared border with Mexico, country where illegal activity was detected, noted suspicious behavior
